property.name: CardText
property.value: R: After you block an attack, add 1 card from your hand to your momentum. Your opponent discards 1 card.F Commit, discard X cards: Add X random cards from your momentum to your hand. X may not be more than your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F: Name 1 card. Reveal 1 random card from your momentum. If the revealed card is the same as the named card, play it (no control check necessary). Only playable if you have at least 2 momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Destroy this card, commit any number of your foundations: Add X random cards from your momentum to your hand. X equals half of the number of foundations committed for this ability (rounded down).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, you may remove your hand from the game. If you do, add All of the cards in your momentum to your hand. At the end of this turn, discard your hand and add X cards from your removed from the game pile to your hand. X equals your hand size.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this card is added to your momentum from your card pool this turn, add it face up.E: Reveal 1 copy of this card in your hand. Add the revealed card to your momentum. Your opponent discards 2 cards. Only playable while this card is face up in your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is in your card pool, after your opponent plays an attack, you may add 1 card from your hand to your momentum. If you do, your opponent discards 1 card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: Your opponent discards 1 card. Only playable during your opponent's turn.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, add 1 random card from your momentum to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After you play a foundation or asset, add 1 card from your hand to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Destroy this card, discard 1 momentum: Your opponent discards 2 cards. If your character is B. Jenet, add 1 card from your hand to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit: Until the end of this turn, your control checks cannot be reduced.E: If your attack played as a Reversal deals damage, add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack deals damage, add it to your momentum.Galford R: After a control check is modified, return that check to its starting value.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is ready in your staging area, control values may not be reduced below their printed value.F Destroy this card: Take X cards from your card pool and add them to your momentum. X equals the number of non-attack cards you have played this turn.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: If you block this attack with a Reversal, you may then attempt to play that attack as a Reversal as though it were in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack would be added to your momentum from your card pool this turn, add it to your staging area face up instead.F: Commit 1 foundation: Play this attack as though it were in your hand. Only playable while this card is face up in your staging area.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0.While this card is in your card pool, when your opponent modifies a control check, if that modifier is a penalty, change it to a bonus instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this attack is completely blocked, it still deals half damage (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: Before you fail a control check that was modified by your opponent, that check is successful instead.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Discard X momentum: Add X cards from your card pool to your momentum. X cannot be higher than the number of Reversals in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this Reversal deals damage, destroy 1 card in your opponent's staging area with a printed ability that reduces control checks.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation: After you block an attack, discard the block from your card pool.E Commit: Your [Order] or [Void] attack gets +4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F Commit 1 foundation: Each player chooses 1 card from their hand and places it face down in front of them. Each player reveals the chosen card. The player who reveals the card with the lowest control gets +5 damage to their next attack played this game.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your [Order] attacl gets +3 damage.R Commit: After you block with an attack card, add the card you blocked with to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, the next [Order] or [Void] attack you play this turn gets +2 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you block with this card, discard it from your card pool.Haohmaru E Commit 1 foundation: This attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of other [Order] or [Void] attacks in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Reveal your hand. This attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of blocks revealed in your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If you block this attack, add the card you blocked with to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If this attack deals damage, discard All cards played as blocks from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: Your [Order] or [Void] attack gets +X damage. X equals the number of blocks in your card pool.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: Discard this card and all cards played as blocks from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, discard 1 momentum: After your attack gets a damage bonus, that attack gets an additional +3 damage.R Discard 1 momentum: After a control check is made that check gets -2. Failing this control check will not end the Combat Phase.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit 1 foundation, discard 1 momentum: Before a control check is made, that check gets -2.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your next attack this turn gets +X damage. X equals your next attack's control.

property.name: CardText
property.value: While this card is ready your control checks get -1 and your attacks get +1 damage.E Commit, destroy 1 asset: Destroy 1 of your opponent's assets.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play the breaker ability on this card, discard it from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: Destroy 1 of your opponent's assets. This attack gets +X damage. X equals the destroyed asset's control.

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0.E: If this attack deals damage, the next attack you play this turn gets +X damage. X equals your next attack's damage.

property.value: R Destroy this card, discard 1 momentum: Before a control check is made, that check get -2.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your [Earth] and [Fire] attack gets +4 damage. If your attack is blocked it gets -4 damage.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your attack gets +X damage. X equals half of the difference between this attack's current damage and its printed damage (rounded up).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Destroy 1 foundation: Your attack gets +X speed. X equals the destroyed foundation's difficulty.R Destroy 1 foundation: Before a control check is made, that control check gets +X. X equals the destroyed foundation's difficulty.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, discard this card from your card pool. Before the control check for your next attack this turn, either your control check to play that attack gets +X or if that attack is played it gets Stun: X (your choice). X equals the number of cards in your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Destroy this asset: Either your control checks to play attacks this turn get +2 or your Stun attacks this turn get +2 speed (your choice).

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0.Kula E: Change the attack zone of this attack to any other zone. Only playable if your opponent committed a foundation due to this attack's Stun ability.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit 1 foundation: If your character is ready and this attack deals damage, any foundations your opponent commits due to any of your attacks' Stun abilities this turn cannot be readied during your opponent's next Ready Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: After you play the Stun ability of this card, if your opponent cannot commit All 4 foundations, your next attack this turn gets +X to its control check. X equals the number of foundations your opponent should have committed but did not.

property.name: CardText
property.value: F: Add this card from your staging area to your card pool. Until the end of the turn as long as this card is in your card pool All your attacks get -1 difficulty and any attacks you play this turn get +2 speed. When you clear your card pool, discard this card.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, destroy 2 foundations: Before a control check is made, that check gets -X. X equals the lowest difficulty printed on the foundations destroyed to pay this ability's cost. Failing this control check will not end the Combat Phase.

property.name: Split Rules
property.value: R Add 1 card from your hand to your card pool face down: After a control check is made, that check gets -1.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: If your Stun attack deals damage and your opponent has no ready foundations, the next attack you play this turn gets +2 speed.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit: After a player makes a control check, during your turn, that check is equal to your momentum (minimum 2).R: After your opponent plays a card or ability that affects 1 of your cards in play, take 1 random card from your hand and add it to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Discard X momentum: After you fail a control check, that check is successful. X equals the amount the control check failed by.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, discard 1 momentum: After you make a control check that is less than your momemtum, that check gets +X. X equals the difference between your momentum and that check (minimum 0).

property.name: CardText
property.value: The control check to play this card is equal to your momentum (no control check necessary).

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, the next control check you make this turn is equal to your momentum (no control check necessary).

property.name: CardText
property.value: This card may be played as a block against any ranged attack as if this card had a mid block of +0.This attack cannot be made unblockable.E: If this attack deals damage, until the end of this turn your control checks get +X. X equals your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Commit, discard 1 momentum: After you make a control check which is less than the total difficulty needed for that check, before you commit foundations to make that check successful, your check is modified to be equal to your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If your attack is blocked and deals no damage, add that attack to your momentum. The next control check you make this turn gets +X. X equals your momentum. After your next form this turn, your Combat Phase ends Only playable on your turn.

property.value: R: After you play a card, gain 2 vitality. Only playable if you have at least 2 cards in your card pool.E Commit 1 foundation: If you have at least 1 momentum and if your attack deals damage, add 1 card from your discard pile to your hand.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: R (5+): After your attack is blocked, add the top card of your deck to your card pool face down. Commit 1 of your opponent's foundations. That foundation may not ready during your opponent's next Ready Step.

property.name: CardText
property.value: First F Commit (6+): Add 1 card from the top of your deck to your card pool. If your opponent's character does not share a resource symbol with your character, discard any number of cards from your hand. Draw X cards. X equals the number of cards discarded for this ability.

property.name: CardText

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Remove X cards in your discard pile from the game: Add up to X cards from your momentum to your hand. X may not be greater than your momentum.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E: If this attack deals damage, your opponent does not draw cards from the top of their deck during their next Draw Step. For each card your opponent would have drawn, they add 1 card from their momentum to their hand instead. If your opponent runs out of momentum before they are finished drawing cards, they may draw from the top of their deck as normal.

property.name: CardText
property.value: If this card blocks an attack with Multiple, All of that card's Multiple copies are discarded.E: If this attack deals damage, add 1 card from your momentum to your hand. Before you clear your card pool this End Phase, discard this card from your card pool.

property.name: CardText
property.value: R Destroy this card: After you pass as your first form this Combat Phase, add your entire momentum to your hand.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 2 momentum: If this attack deals damage, each player can only perform a total of X+2 forms per turn until the end of your next turn. X equals that player's momentum. After they have played their total number of forms, their next form must be a pass. Only playable during your opponent's turn.

property.value: F: Each player gains 20 vitality, which cannot be altered in any way. If this returns a player to their maximum vitality, that player draws 3 cards.

property.value: R Destroy this card: Before you make a control check to play an attack, that check gets +3.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit: Your high zone attack gets +2 speed. If you are playing an [Earth] character it gets +1 damage as well.

property.name: CardText
property.value: E Commit, discard 1 momentum: If your opponent blocks this attack, they discard 1 of their momentum.
